text:
We owe workers who have died at work – and those who continue to risk their lives during the coronavirus pandemic – a vision of a better future.

Join me in observing a minute’s silence at 11am today to remember those who have lost their lives. 

#InternationalWorkersMemorialDay https://t.co/deQy0LARxP
